entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 16 February 2023
